projects.title: Belle E-commerce
projects.summary:
This is an e-commerce web application built using PERN Stack

Shopper features include browsing products, adding items to cart, viewing blog content, etc...

Administrative features include the ability to create and manage product and blog pages (as editor role), to manage order and user list and to generate sales reports (as admin role)

projects.title: ALi Chat
projects.summary:
This is a MERN chat application with basic chat features

Allow users to send messages with emojis and photos in personal chat or group chat

experience.description:
SalesHood is a SaaS platform that enables businesses to automate their sales processes and enhance sales performance.

As part of the Client Site team, I am primarily responsible for frontend development. My role involves collaborating with product managers and designers in an Agile/Scrum environment to define and implement software solutions.

Key responsibilities include optimizing feature performance, ensuring product quality, and enhancing performance by implementing robust unit and end-to-end tests.

Having hands-on experience: Micro frontend, React, React Context, Redux for state management, React Query for data fetching, Ant Design for UI components, Figma for design, Vite for bundling, Jest with Testing Library for unit testing and Playwright for end to end testing.
